title: Roller Coaster Tycoon 1,2,3 Trilogy repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
Roller Coaster 1,2,3 Trilogy

Repack features:

Do not cut 
Language interface: English 
Precracked - install and play
Install Time - 2minutes [Quad Core]
Final size: 2.26gb
Operating system: Win XP,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)

Contents:

1.) RollerCoaster Tycoon 1 + Rollercoaster Tycoon 1: Corckscrew Follies & Loopy Landscapes expansion

2.) Rollercoaster Tycoon 2

3.) Rollercoaster Tycoon 3 Platinum:
   
    Rollercoaster Tycoon 3
    Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Soaked!
    Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Wild!

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut(Roller Coaster Tycoon 3)....

OPEN ALL THE GAMES USING 'RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR' to avoid any crash/savegame isssue....

To play Roller coaster tycoon 1, open install directory, open 'RollerCoaster Tycoon' folder, open 'RCT.exe' using 'Run as administrator' .....

To play Roller coaster tycoon 2, open install directory, open 'RollerCoaster Tycoon 2' folder, open 'rct2.exe' usig 'Run as administrator'...
Note: Before playing it, Right click on 'rct2.exe' , click on Properties, select 'Compatibility' tab, tick the checkbox 'Reduced color mode' and select '8 bit (256) color' (or it may be 'Run in 256 color', so tick it) and apply....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
